hero.title: Calculus
hero.subtitle: The mathematics of change. Learn limits, derivatives, and integrals.

content.text: Algebra and Geometry. Familiarity with functions, polynomial equations, and trigonometry recommended.
Upon completing this course, you will be able to:

items: Understand and work with limits and continuity
Apply calculus to optimization and real-world problems

content.text: Foundations of calculus. Understanding limits formally. Continuity and why it matters.
The derivative as a rate of change. Rules of differentiation. Computing derivatives.
Curve sketching. Optimization. Motion and rates. Applications to real-world problems.
Antiderivatives. The integral. Fundamental Theorem of Calculus. Computing integrals.
Area and volume. Arc length. Work and other physical applications.
Introduction to differential equations. Sequences and series. Convergence and Taylor series.

items: What is Mathematics? by Richard Courant and Herbert Robbins
